name: Swords Guys 3D
description:
Sword guys 3D V1 Demo Work In Progress.

Game is available for both PC and Android. 

This isn't alpha, beta, theta, delta.. no idea, it just is. 

There will be dragons... 

Looking for feedback, ideas, etc. This is version 1 - more updates are to come. I'm looking for *constructive criticism*, I'm all ears. Shoot me you ideas. In time i shall finish the level. The goal will be to reach the dragon.  

This is for both PC and Android devices. Many thanks! I leave the internet this seed. Help it blossom. I will leave it at this.

I'm just working this out as I go. Feedback is all I'm after, and I'd like to make games for the internet For now, here is Sword Guy 3D V1 . Remember that more shall come, and I'm destiny's future.

My name is Tristan, and I am ALIVE!
